sourcesContent:
<template>
	<ParentComponent
		pageTitle="LeBron James"
		divId="div1"
		selectContentClass="custom-class"
		@chartInteraction="handleChartInteraction" />
</template>

<script setup>
	import ParentComponent from "@/components/compoents_base/ParentComponent.vue";
	import { onMounted, onUnmounted } from "vue";
	import bus from "@/js/eventBus.js";

	// 处理图表交互事件
	function handleChartInteraction(eventData) {
		if (eventData.source === "div1") {
			// 将事件传递给 Div2
			bus.emit("chartInteraction", eventData);
		}
	}

	onMounted(() => {
		// 监听来自 Div2 的图表交互事件
		bus.on("chartInteraction", eventData => {
			if (eventData.source === "div2") {
				// 根据 eventData.data 更新 Div1 的图表
				updateChart(eventData.data);
			}
		});
	});

	onUnmounted(() => {
		bus.off("chartInteraction");
	});
</script>
